titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at St. Olave Southwark, September the 8th, 1700 occasioned by the recantation of Dr. Joh. Spire, lately a Quaker : which said recantation is added at the end / by John Haslewood ...
titleStmt.author: Haslewood, John, b. 1647.
Spire, John. Oration at the parish-church of St. Olave-Southwark.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
